node.statement: INDEX-2 DICHOTOMY: Since [S_n : A_n] = 2, the subgroup A_n has exactly two cosets in S_n: the coset A_n (even permutations) and the coset S_n \ A_n (odd permutations). By Lagrange's theorem, any subgroup G with A_n ≤ G ≤ S_n has index [S_n : G] dividing [S_n : A_n] = 2. Thus [S_n : G] ∈ {1, 2}, which means G = S_n or G = A_n.
